summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A TEGOL OUTLAW HELMET, MODEL: AX-3. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 13E047000 (EQUIPMENT). THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AT 866-371-0281 APPROXIMATELY TWO MONTHS AGO. THE CONTACT LEFT THE REQUIRED VOICEMAIL FOR A CALL BACK, BUT THERE HAD BEEN NO RESPONSE. THE CONTACT SENT AN E-MAIL FOUR TIMES TO TEGOLINC@GMAIL.COM AND TEGOLRECALL@GMAIL.COM, BUT NO RESPONSE WAS PROVIDED. THE CONTACT FELT THAT A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME HAD PASSED FOR THE RECALL REMEDY. THE CONTACT DID NOT EXPERIENCE A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
